audio_group_stop_all.htm+html.head.title: audio_group_stop_all.htm+html.body.p:87-3
audio_group_stop_all: This function will stop all sounds from the given audio group that are currently playing.

audio_group_stop_all.htm+html.head.title: audio_group_stop_all.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:99-9
audio_group_stop_all: The index of the audio group to stop (as defined in the Audio Groups Window)

audio_group_stop_all.htm+html.head.title: audio_group_stop_all.htm+html.body.p:112-3
audio_group_stop_all: The above code checks for the "space" key and then stops all the audio playing from the given group.
